      • getApplicationIconImage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage getApplicationIconImage()
        Gets the application image. This is a buffered image of size 64x64. If the Quaqua JNI code and the ImageIO API are present, this will get the image from the OS X application bundle. In all other cases this will return a default application image.
